title: Ticket #3524: GT5 does not return job's exit code.
description:
[This ticket for work being done on behalf of Eric Heien.]

Metronome (and DAGMan) really need to know the exit code of the GT5 job in order to have proper reporting and semantics. For instance, the platform_post step isn't run if the platform_job (the GT5 job) fails. According to Jaime, this is simply unimplemented (as opposed to broken).

Metronome can fake this in a DAGMan postcript (probably); this will probably be even more troublesome for other users.
